trans-unit.source: Group Module Settings
trans-unit.target: Group Module Settings

trans-unit.source: Select the Role Group that contains the roles you want to display.
trans-unit.target: Select the Role Group that contains the roles you want to display.

trans-unit.source: Default Role Group
trans-unit.target: Default Role Group

trans-unit.source: Select the page where users will go to create new groups.
trans-unit.target: Select the page where users will go to create new groups.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to allow users to filter groups.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to allow users to filter groups.

trans-unit.source: Enable Group Search
trans-unit.target: Enable Group Search

trans-unit.source: Enter the number of groups displayed per page.
trans-unit.target: Enter the number of groups displayed per page.

trans-unit.source: Group List Page Size
trans-unit.target: Group List Page Size

trans-unit.source: Choose the sort direction for the list of groups.
trans-unit.target: Choose the sort direction for the list of groups.

trans-unit.source: Sort Direction
trans-unit.target: Sort Direction

trans-unit.source: Choose the field that will be used to sort the list of groups.
trans-unit.target: Choose the field that will be used to sort the list of groups.

trans-unit.source: Sort List By
trans-unit.target: Sort List By

trans-unit.source:
You can modify the default template in order to customize the group list display. Common tokens are:

[groupitem:GroupName]

[groupitem:GroupDescription]

[groupitem:PhotoURL]

[groupviewurl]
trans-unit.target:
You can modify the default template in order to customize the group list display. Common tokens are:

[groupitem:GroupName]

[groupitem:GroupDescription]

[groupitem:PhotoURL]

[groupviewurl]

trans-unit.source: Group List Template
trans-unit.target: Group List Template

trans-unit.source: Check this box to only display groups that the current user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to only display groups that the current user belongs to.

trans-unit.source: Display User's Groups Only
trans-unit.target: Display User's Groups Only

trans-unit.source: Check this box if new groups to require the approval by a Group Moderator.
trans-unit.target: Check this box if new groups to require the approval by a Group Moderator.

trans-unit.source: Group Creation Requires Approval
trans-unit.target: Group Creation Requires Approval

trans-unit.source: Select the page where users will go to view a particular group.
trans-unit.target: Select the page where users will go to view a particular group.

trans-unit.source:
You can modify the default template in order to customize the group list display. Common tokens are:

[groupitem:GroupName]

[groupitem:GroupDescription]

[groupitem:PhotoURL]

[groupviewurl]
trans-unit.target:
You can modify the default template in order to customize the group list display. Common tokens are:

trans-unit.source: Invalid page size specified. (1-9999)
trans-unit.target: Invalid page size specified. (1-9999)

trans-unit.source: Select the mode in which the module should display.
trans-unit.target: Select the mode in which the module should display.
